body:
If I can see the 4th and 5th chapter of this series, I'll be glad to die. I'm not asking for translations, though~ Just wondering like this Berkel guy here why the new releases ain't there yet :3
Well probably it's because there's so many good Hentais and too few teams working on them, what with most of you freebies leechers just wanting the good stuff without ever giving a hand! 
Then again I'm one of those aforementioned leechers, so please treat us well ~ :3 
Here's hoping for the 4th and so forth of the series' chapter!
Sorry i don't wanna die but its weird, you translate first 3 chapters many months ago and why you don't finish it? I mean 4 and 5 chapter?
